item.title: [PI] Highscores
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

I’ve setup my highscores perfectly, and it’s connected to my server and all, but only I can view it, how to do I make it so anyone can view the highscores?
I’ve been following this tutorial http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/334470-hiscores.html

So far I’ve been going to http://localhost/highscores/
I heard that you change the URL in Highscoreshandler.java with

private static final String DB = "hiscores"; private static final String URL = "*WHAT DO I PUT HERE?"; private static final String USER = "*REMOVED*"; private static final String PASS = "*REMOVED*"; private static final Properties prop;

What do I change it to? My server is run with NO-IP, do I use that? Or something else.

Read full topic
